java/liquibase/database/sql/CreateSequenceStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00005 
00006 public class CreateSequenceStatement implements SqlStatement {
00007 
00008     private String schemaName;
00009     private String sequenceName;
00010     private Integer startValue;
00011     private Integer incrementBy;
00012     private Integer maxValue;
00013     private Integer minValue;
00014     private Boolean ordered;
00015 
00016     public CreateSequenceStatement(String schemaName, String sequenceName) {
00017         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00018         this.sequenceName = sequenceName;
00019     }
00020 
00021     public String getSchemaName() {
00022         return schemaName;
00023     }
00024 
00025     public String getSequenceName() {
00026         return sequenceName;
00027     }
00028 
00029     public Integer getStartValue() {
00030         return startValue;
00031     }
00032 
00033     public CreateSequenceStatement setStartValue(Integer startValue) {
00034         this.startValue = startValue;
00035         return this;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public Integer getIncrementBy() {
00039         return incrementBy;
00040     }
00041 
00042     public CreateSequenceStatement setIncrementBy(Integer incrementBy) {
00043         this.incrementBy = incrementBy;
00044         return this;
00045     }
00046 
00047     public Integer getMaxValue() {
00048         return maxValue;
00049     }
00050 
00051     public CreateSequenceStatement setMaxValue(Integer maxValue) {
00052         this.maxValue = maxValue;
00053         return this;
00054     }
00055 
00056     public Integer getMinValue() {
00057         return minValue;
00058     }
00059 
00060     public CreateSequenceStatement setMinValue(Integer minValue) {
00061         this.minValue = minValue;
00062         return this;
00063     }
00064 
00065     public Boolean getOrdered() {
00066         return ordered;
00067     }
00068 
00069     public CreateSequenceStatement setOrdered(Boolean ordered) {
00070         this.ordered = ordered;
00071         return this;
00072     }
00073 
00074     public String getSqlStatement(Database database) throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00075         if (!supportsDatabase(database)) {
00076             throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException(this, database);
00077         }
00078 
00079         StringBuffer buffer = new StringBuffer();
00080         buffer.append("CREATE SEQUENCE ");
00081         buffer.append(database.escapeSequenceName(getSchemaName(), getSequenceName()));
00082         if (getStartValue() != null) {
00083             if (database instanceof FirebirdDatabase) {
00084                 throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Firebird does not support creating sequences with startValue", this, database);
00085             } else {
00086                 buffer.append(" START WITH ").append(getStartValue());
00087             }
00088         }
00089         if (getIncrementBy() != null) {
00090             if (database instanceof FirebirdDatabase) {
00091                 throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Firebird does not support creating sequences with increments", this, database);
00092             } else {
00093                 buffer.append(" INCREMENT BY ").append(getIncrementBy());
00094             }
00095         }
00096         if (getMinValue() != null) {
00097             if (database instanceof FirebirdDatabase || database instanceof HsqlDatabase) {
00098                 throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Database does not support creating sequences with minValue", this, database);
00099             } else {
00100                 buffer.append(" MINVALUE ").append(getMinValue());
00101             }
00102         }
00103         if (getMaxValue() != null) {
00104             if (database instanceof FirebirdDatabase || database instanceof HsqlDatabase) {
00105                 throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Database does not support creating sequences with maxValue", this, database);
00106             } else {
00107                 buffer.append(" MAXVALUE ").append(getMaxValue());
00108             }
00109         }
00110 
00111         if (getOrdered() != null) {
00112             if (database instanceof OracleDatabase || database instanceof DB2Database || database instanceof MaxDBDatabase) {
00113                 if (getOrdered()) {
00114                     buffer.append(" ORDER");
00115                 }
00116             } else {
00117                 throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException("Database does not support creating sequences with 'order'", this, database);
00118             }
00119         }
00120 
00121         return buffer.toString();
00122     }
00123 
00124     public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00125         return ";";
00126     }
00127 
00128     public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00129         return database.supportsSequences();
00130     }
00131 }
